job.title: A01 - Software Engineer II - Cleared
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: We are looking for a <strong>fully cleared</strong> associate software engineer with experience developing web-based UIs.<br><br><strong><u>Requirements<br><br></u></strong>TS/SCI with poly required<br><li> A minimum of seven (7) years experience in software engineering/development and/or systems engineering/analysis.</li><ul> <li>A Bachelors degree in engineering, computer science, mathematics, or related discipline may be substituted for three (3) years of work experience.</li> <li>A Masters degree in any of the above disciplines may be substituted for an additional two (2) years of experience.</li> </ul> <li> Must possess experience in all phases of software engineering to include requirements analysis, development, testing and integration, maintenance and problem diagnosis/resolution and/or experience in phases of applications systems analysis to include evaluation and design, integration and optimization of complex systems. </li><li> Must have experience with communication applications, database management, use of programming languages and knowledge of storage and retrieval methods. </li><li>7+ years of experience in the following </li><li>UI Frameworks (Kendo, Sencha, JQuery, NodeJS, etc) </li><ul> <li>JavaScript </li> <li>HTML5/CSS </li> <li>Java </li> <li>Unix/Linux </li> <li>Web Services </li> <li>Has performed new development and Dev Ops </li> <li>Apache Nifi</li> <li>C++</li> <li>Scripting (Python, Perl)</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Desired Skills<br><br></u></strong><li> Responsible for developing applications software for small to highly complex computer systems or portions of large integrated systems and/or for providing analysis and engineering of functional aspects of software and hardware architecture and system support.</li><li> The candidate will prepare detailed specifications from which software products will be designed and/or candidate will translate documented designs into software products by developing, documenting, testing and debugging code.</li><li> Applications generally deal with utility programs, job control language, macro, subroutines and other control modules. </li><li> Candidate shall be competent to work at the highest level of all phases of software engineering and/or all phases of applications systems analysis with minimal direction or oversight.<br><br></li><u><strong>Benefits<br><br></strong></u><li>Health &amp; Life Insurance</li><li> Dental Insurance</li><li> Disability Insurance</li><li> 401K Retirement Plan with Matching</li><li> Tuition Assistance</li><li> Vacation and Sick Leave</li><li> Hiring Bonuses</li><li> Referral Recruitment Program</li>
